overview: Automates PM service tracking for all branches.
Processes combined INCUS5 exports and splits data by branch.
Retains service notes and due statuses for continuity.
Formats branch tabs using the Springfield template.
features: Carryover of Notes/Due fields across updates.
Dynamic Information tab pulling GitHub metadata.
planned: Add calendar integration for service scheduling.
Generate branch-specific 'Top 20' lists by overdue ranking.
limitations: Requires Drive API to be enabled.
Large files (>15MB) may take several minutes.
Google OAuth permissions required on first use.
